definitions.definition: (with up) To heat; to make or become hot.
(with up) To become lively or exciting.
(of an object) Having a high temperature.
definitions.example: He forgot that the frying pan was hot and burned his hand.

definitions.definition: (of the weather) Causing the air to be hot.
definitions.example: It is hotter in summer than in winter.

definitions.definition: (of a person or animal) Feeling the sensation of heat, especially to the point of discomfort.
definitions.example: Aren't you hot with that thick coat on?

definitions.definition: (of a temper) Easily provoked to anger.
definitions.example: Be careful, he has a hot temper and may take it out on you.

definitions.definition: Feverish.
(of food) Spicy.
definitions.example: Before moving to India, I never ate hot food. The Indians love spicy food.

definitions.definition: Very good, remarkable, exciting.
definitions.example: He's a hot young player, we should give him a trial.

definitions.definition: Stolen.
Electrically charged.
Radioactive.
(of a person) Very physically and/or sexually attractive.
Sexual or sexy; involving sexual intercourse or sexual excitement.
Sexually aroused; randy.
definitions.example: Enough foreplay! You’ve gotten me so hot already!

definitions.definition: (with for) Attracted to.
Popular; in demand.
definitions.example: This new pickup is so hot we can't keep it in stock!

definitions.definition: Of great current interest; provoking current debate or controversy.
Very close to finding or guessing something to be found or guessed.
definitions.example: Am I warm yet? — You're hot!

definitions.definition: Performing strongly; having repeated successes.
Fresh; just released.
Uncomfortable, difficult to deal with; awkward, dangerous, unpleasant.
Used to emphasize the short duration or small quantity of something
definitions.example: He was finished in a hot minute.

definitions.definition: Characterized by police presence or activity.
definitions.example: I wouldn't speed through here if I was you. This area is hot this time of night.

definitions.definition: (of a draft/check) Not covered by funds on account.
definitions.example: I wouldn't trust him. He gave me a hot check last week.
